FuncDef: The display system tcam resource acl command displays TCAM resource information on a specified device. The display system tcam resource acl command displays TCAM resource information on a specified device.
CLIs: display system tcam resource acl [ slot <slot-id> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays TCAM resource information on a specified device.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.
